00021 // DoubleExpSynMechConfig (conductance synapse configurator) class definition
00023 
00024 class DoubleExpSynMechConfig
00025         : public ConfigBase
00026 {
00027 public:
00029 
00032     typedef DoubleExpSynMech related_component;
00033 
00035     MAKE_VISITABLE(DoubleExpSynMechConfig)
00036 
00037 public:
00038 //  DoubleExpSynMechConfig(double tauA, double tauB);
00039     DoubleExpSynMechConfig(std::ifstream & is);
00040     inline const double & factorA() const {
00041         return factorA_;
00042     }
00043     inline const double & factorB() const {
00044         return factorB_;
00045     }
00046     inline const double & renorm() const {
00047         return renorm_;
00048     }
00049 private:
00050     double factorA_, factorB_, renorm_;
00051 #ifdef _DEBUG
00052     double tauA_, tauB_; // only available in DEBUG mode, just for information anyway
00053 #endif
00054 };

00056 
00058 // DoubleExpSynMech definition
00059 // models a synapse with a double exponential synaptic current injection from each event
00061 
00062 class DoubleExpSynMech
00063         : public SynMechInterface
00064 {
00065     template <class SynData, class SynMech, class PlastMech, class TypeBase> friend class SynapseTemplate;
00066     template <class PoissonParameter, class ActivationFunction> friend class PoissonMech;
00067 public:
00068     explicit DoubleExpSynMech(ConfigBase * const configurator);
00069     ~DoubleExpSynMech() {
00070         delete[] alphajump_;
00071     }
00072 protected:
00073 //  template <class TypeImpl> void send_updated_states(TypeImpl & neuron);
00074     void send_updated_states(double & current);
00075     void send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current) {
00076         throw Error("DoubleExpSynMech: should not be used");
00077     }
00078     void on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & delayedspike_time, const double & synweight);
00079 private:
00080     void perform_calculations();
00081     const DoubleExpSynMechConfig * const asmcfg_;
00082     double current_; // synaptic influx
00083     double alphaA_, alphaB_; // state variables for conductance
00084     double * alphajump_;
00085     Size nextjump_; //
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00089 
00091 // inline definitions
00093 
00095 // constructor
00096 inline DoubleExpSynMech::DoubleExpSynMech(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00097         : asmcfg_(dynamic_cast<DoubleExpSynMechConfig *>(configurator))
00098         , current_(0.)
00099         , alphaA_(0.)
00100         , alphaB_(0.)
00101         , nextjump_(0)
00102 {
00103     if (! asmcfg_) throw ConfigError("DoubleExpSynMech: void configurator");
00104 
00105     alphajump_ = new double [ SimEnv::i_max_delay()];
00106     for (Size i = 0; i < SimEnv::i_max_delay(); ++i)
00107         alphajump_[i] = 0.0;
00108 }
00109 
00111 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00112 inline void DoubleExpSynMech::on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & time_lag_to_spike, const double & synweight)
00113 {
00114     Size spot = nextjump_ + (Size) ceil(time_lag_to_spike / SimEnv::timestep());
00115     if (spot >= SimEnv::i_max_delay()) spot -= SimEnv::i_max_delay();
00116     alphajump_[spot] += synweight;
00117 }
00118 
00120 // send the updated states (current) to the neuron activation mechanism
00121 inline void DoubleExpSynMech::send_updated_states(double & current)
00122 {
00123     perform_calculations();
00124     current += current_;
00125 }
00126 
00128 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00129 inline void DoubleExpSynMech::perform_calculations()
00130 {
00131     ++nextjump_;
00132     if (nextjump_ == SimEnv::i_max_delay()) nextjump_ = 0;
00133 
00134     alphaA_ *= asmcfg_->factorA();
00135     alphaA_ += alphajump_[nextjump_];
00136     alphaB_ *= asmcfg_->factorB();
00137     alphaB_ += alphajump_[nextjump_];
00138 
00139     current_ = (alphaB_ - alphaA_) * asmcfg_->renorm();
00140 
00141     alphajump_ [nextjump_] = 0.0;
00142 }
00143

00145 #endif // !defined(ALPHASYNMECH_H)
